name: a game where roots are attacking a beaver who wants to collect some sticks
name_original: a game where roots are attacking a beaver who wants to collect some sticks
description:
Our game is a game where roots are attacking a beaver who wants to collect some sticks. 

Jump over the roots of the evil tree (oh no! how spooky!) and collect 5 sticks for some reason to win the game. But if you get hit by the roots of the tree 3 times, you'll loose the game and have to start over. It's pretty groundbreaking, we know. 

It's basically a souls-like game but better because it has a beaver in it. 

Anyway, use WASD to control the beaver and space to jump.
